attributes.action: Change the school timetable so Corvid19 lockdown counts as the summer holidays
attributes.additional_details:
This would allow the children to catch up with missed schoolwork from schooling online, the break from going to school would not be so long a period from leaving school to starting again.
Parents can then go back to work and make up for the losses they have suffered due to Corvid19 lockdown. Basically switch the whole year of 2020 on its head.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to change the school timetable, so that the summer holidays are the same as the Corvid19 lockdown period and allow the children to go back to school when it would be the summer holidays to catch up on any school work that they have missed by schooling online.
